channel.title: +०१ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +०१ on यजुर्वेदे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: THE SATARUDRIYA.
item.description: I. 1. Reverence, O Rudra, be to thy wrath; and to thine arrow be reverence; and to both thine arms be reverence! 2. What auspicious form there is of thine, free from terror and boding of evil, with that most propitious form look down upon us, O mountain-dweller! 3. The shaft thou bearest in thy hand to hurl, O mountain-dweller, make it harmless, O protector of mountains, injure not man nor beast!

item.title: UNKNOWN_TITLE
item.description: 01 He then sprinkles him (Agni-Rudra, the fire-altar). For the gods, having now appeased him by the Śatarudriya, thereby appeased him still further; and in like manner does this (Sacrificer), now that he has appeased him by the Śatarudriya, still further appease him thereby. 02 With water he sprinkles him 1,–water is a means of appeasing (soothing): he thus appeases him thereby. He sprinkles him all over; he thus appeases him all over.
